name: tormentor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who causes a person or an animal great mental suffering and unhappiness, or great physical pain: Victims of oppression seldom have a chance to face their tormentors. Both the children have encountered their former tormentors in the street. See
torment
More examplesFewer examplesHe realises that his chief tormentor is being bullied in turn by his father. He dived through the window to escape his tormentor.The moment she confronted her tormentor in court will remain with her for the rest of her life.
